channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft SharePoint Enterprise Server 2013 Service Pack 1
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft SharePoint Enterprise Server 2013 Service Pack 1

item.title: CVE-2020-1224|2024-08-04T06:31:59.956Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20sharepoint%20enterprise%20server%202013%20service%20pack%201
item.description:
An information disclosure vulnerability exists when Microsoft Excel improperly discloses the contents of its memory. An attacker who exploited the vulnerability could use the information to compromise the userâ€™s computer or data.

To exploit the vulnerability, an attacker could craft a special document file and then convince the user to open it. An attacker must know the memory address location where the object was created.

The update addresses the vulnerability by changing the way certain Excel functions handle objects in memory.

item.title: CVE-2021-40442|2024-08-04T02:44:10.509Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20sharepoint%20enterprise%20server%202013%20service%20pack%201
item.description: Microsoft Excel Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
